overview.heading: Gaithersburg Virtual Office
overview.body: Secure your own prestigious Gaithersburg address without the burden of leasing physical office space. At Opus VO, your business can reside in the energetic heart of Gaithersburg while maintaining a flexible budget. Have an urgent conference or high-stakes client pitch? Our top-tier meeting rooms are equipped to leave a lasting impression.  When you choose a virtual office in Gaithersburg with Opus VO, a dedicated live receptionist is also included in your package. We strive to make every client interaction feel like a tailored extension of your brand’s unique ethos. Relinquish your day-to-day admin tasks to us, allowing you to zero in on your entrepreneurial pursuits.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Gaithersburg, Maryland even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Gaithersburg. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Maryland.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Gaithersburg virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Gaithersburg?
sections.body: Don’t overlook Gaithersburg—it’s a thriving center for a wide array of industries, from biotech to software development. Setting up shop here means having access to a wealth of networking events and potential business partners that can amplify your reach and influence.  Opting for a virtual office via Opus VO in Gaithersburg isn’t merely a wise financial move; it’s a distinct competitive advantage. Are you geared up to level up your business? Our unparalleled virtual office solutions are ready for your use.  Opus VO, Gaithersburg @ 267 Kentlands Blvd, Gaithersburg, MD 20878
